meanings.definition: To write or draw with a pencil.
meanings.sent1: She penciled a beautiful picture of a flower.
meanings.sent2: He always penciled his notes neatly in class.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to pencil a message on the wall but failed.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter penciled joy across her face.
meanings.sent5: The artist penciled the sunset with vibrant colors.

meanings.definition: Having markings made with a pencil.
meanings.sent1: The penciled lines on the paper were faint.
meanings.sent2: The penciled sketch of the house was detailed.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a penciled clue on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her penciled eyebrows framed her face elegantly.
meanings.sent5: The penciled map led them to the hidden treasure.
